title: Rohingya refugees test Bangladesh's welcome
text:
Rohingya refugees test Bangladesh's welcome Wednesday, February 28, 2018 - 01:53 
Hundreds of thousands of Rohingya Muslim refugees from Myanmar are overwhelming local communities in neighboring Bangladesh. So far, locals have welcomed the refugees but there is potential trouble ahead as prices rise and the Rohingya keep coming. Reuters' Andrew Marshall reports.
